cookingTips: Scrub potatoes thoroughly and prick with a fork before cooking to allow steam to escape
Rub with oil and salt for crispy skin and enhanced flavor
Air fry at 400°F for 25-30 minutes, shaking basket halfway through for even cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me prepare baked potatoes in the air fryer, explaining how to achieve crispy skin and fluffy insides, and how to tell when they're fully cooked.
